testcase.name: testAdminSection
testcase.system-out: Try to access Admin Section + Angular.access was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.attemptBrokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.inspectScripts was reached instantaneously as expected. + Expressjs.accessServerScripts was reached instantaneously as expected. + Scripts.access was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.accessServerScripts as expected. + Angular.brokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously from Angular.inspectScripts as expected. + Angular.attemptInjectionAttack was reached instantaneously as expected. + Expressjs.sendMaliciousRequest was reached instantaneously as expected. + Sequalize.getRequest was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.sendMaliciousRequest as expected. + SQLite.read was reached instantaneously as expected. + SQLiteDatabase.readUserInfo was reached instantaneously as expected. + adminCredentials.readCredentials was reached instantaneously as expected. + admin.compromise was reached instantaneously from adminCredentials.readCredentials as expected. + user.accountCompromised was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.brokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously from user.accountCompromised as expected. + Angular.brokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously from Angular.attemptInjectionAttack as expected. + Expressjs.access was reached instantaneously as expected. + adminSection.access was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.access as expected. + adminSection.access was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.accessServerScripts as expected.

testcase.name: testAdminSectionWithoutAdminAccount
testcase.system-out: Try to access Admin Section without admin account + Angular.access was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.attemptBrokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.inspectScripts was reached instantaneously as expected. + Expressjs.accessServerScripts was reached instantaneously as expected. + Scripts.access was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.accessServerScripts as expected. + Angular.brokenAccessControlAttack was not reached, as expected. + Expressjs.access was not reached, as expected. + adminSection.access was not reached, as expected.

testcase.name: testAdminSectionWithoutPath
testcase.system-out: Try to access Admin Section when scripts are unavailable + Angular.access was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.attemptBrokenAccessControlAttack was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.attemptInjectionAttack was reached instantaneously as expected. + Expressjs.sendMaliciousRequest was reached instantaneously as expected. + Sequalize.getRequest was reached instantaneously from Expressjs.sendMaliciousRequest as expected. + SQLite.read was reached instantaneously as expected. + SQLiteDatabase.readUserInfo was reached instantaneously as expected. + adminCredentials.readCredentials was reached instantaneously as expected. + admin.compromise was reached instantaneously from adminCredentials.readCredentials as expected. + user.accountCompromised was reached instantaneously as expected. + Angular.brokenAccessControlAttack was not reached, as expected. + Expressjs.access was not reached, as expected. + adminSection.access was not reached, as expected.
